numbered_ace_sentences: 2. I notice that many teens think that the world is getting better.
3. These teens live in more developed countries.
4. These countries are wealthier than other countries.
5. These countries have better technology than other countries.
6. Teens have a more positive outlook than people who are 40 years old or older.
7. Some people think badly about how the world is going.
8. Some people think negatively about the world.
9. I wonder why these people think negatively.
11. The covid lockdown lasted for long hours and long days.
12. The covid lockdown could cause negative thinking.
14. These choices could cause negative thinking.
16. This topic relates to my community.
17. Each person looks at the world from his or her perspective.
19. The headline is "The Positive Generation Coming Up".
